The announcement was made at the Sibos event in Amsterdam via a video link from Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology, says Steve Ballmer . "No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand." After an introduction by Colin Powell and NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell , the film features several NFL players giving readings from the Declaration of Independence. Dancz's score, titled "Declaration Anthem," plays throughout. You get chills thinking about how many people are going to be watching, said Dancz, who wrote the score in collaboration with a former student, Ben Leathers.
